items.name: Amritsari Chole Masala
items.description: Chickpeas cooked with onions, tomato, chillis and fresh spices to give it a zesty flavour
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar

items.name: Bhuna Chicken
items.description: Chicken breast marinated with spices, vinegar, ginger-garlic paste and then cooked in a flavourful spicy gravy of onion, tomato, cashew paste and fresh garam masala.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas or rice + side salad + papad

items.name: Aloo Tikki Chaat
items.description: Potato patty fried and served with spicy and flavourful chickpea gravy topped with sweet and tangy tamrind sauce and spicy green chutney, onion, pomagrante seeds, fresh coriander, sev and chaat masala. A lip smacking snack found on the streets of India. (2 patties)

items.name: Aloo Paratha
items.description: Wholewheat Indian flatbread stuffed with a mixture of mashed potato, chillies and spices. Served with achar and a side of onion-tomato chutney. (2 parathas)

items.name: Bihari Style Kadi Badi
items.description: A tangy and flavorful yogurt curry with deep-fried lentil dumplings, perfect for a comforting and soul-warming meal.
items.extra: make it a meal with rice + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Champaran Lamb Curry
items.description: A dish from the nothern part of India with spicy flavourful lamb pieces cooked together with chillies, garlic, ginger and freshly ground spies, slow cooked on low flame to perfection.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas/rice + side salad + achar

items.name: Sweet Potato Tikki
items.description: Spiced sweet potato patty shallow fried and served with spicy green chutney. (4 tikkis)

items.name: Litti Chokha
items.description: A traditional dish from the Indian state of Bihar. It consists of baked balls made of whole wheat flour and stuffed with a mixture of roasted gram flour, spices, and herbs and served with a side of mashed potatoes and eggplant, along with a tangy tomato and onion chutney.

items.name: Channe Ghasi
items.description: A flavourful coconut based thick chickpea curry prepared with a flavourful blend of spices. A famous mangalorean dish
items.extra: make it a meal with rice + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Chicken Ghee Roast
items.description: Manglorean chicken dish cooked with ghee, onion and dried red chili paste and garnished with fresh corriander
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 paratha + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Masala Vada
items.description: Crispy deep-fried patty/vada made with a mixture of soaked and coarsely ground lentils, primarily chana dal (split chickpeas). (4 pieces)

items.name: Khara Bath
items.description: A popular South Indian variation on rava upma. This dish is made with semolina (rava), vegetables, and spices. It's a savory and comforting dish that's perfect for a quick and easy meal.

items.name: Kabuli Chana Biryani
items.description: A flavorful and aromatic rice dish made with chickpeas (kabuli chana), fragrant spices, and herbs. It's a vegetarian twist on the classic biryani recipe, perfect for a hearty and satisfying meal. Served with yogurt raita + achar + papad.

items.name: Spicy Egg Roast Biryani
items.description: This fiery egg roast layered with fluffy rice for a protein-rich, taste bud tingling treat. Served with achar + papad + raita

items.name: Paneer 65
items.description: A popular Indian appetizer made with cubes of paneer (Indian cottage cheese) that have been marinated in a blend of spices and then deep-fried until crispy. The dish is spiced with a mix of chili powder, cumin, and coriander.

items.name: Kheema Pav
items.description: Minced chicken cooked with onions, tomato, green peas and spices topped with fresh garam masala and coriander for the zing. Served with 2 buns and green chutney

items.name: Veg Fried Rice
items.description: Assorted veggies cooked with long grain basmati rice with flavourful chinese sauces and aromatic spices.
items.extra: make it a wholesome dish with veg manchurian gravy by the side

items.name: Chicken Fried Rice
items.description: Stir fried chicken and assorted veggies cooked with long grain basmati rice with flavourful chinese sauces and aromatic spices.
items.extra: make it a wholesome dish with chicken manchurian gravy by the side

items.name: Chinese Bhel
items.description: A popular Indo-Chinese street food. The dish is made by tossing crispy noodles with a mix of colorful vegetables, manchurian and a variety of sauces, including soy sauce, chili sauce, and tomato ketchup.

items.name: Pongal
items.description: Rice lentils pressure cooked together and tempered with different spices, curry leaves and cashew and served with a side of coconut chutney.

items.name: Paneer Afghani
items.description: Soft paneer cubes marinated in a rich blend of yogurt, cream, and aromatic spices, grilled to perfection for a creamy, indulgent delight.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Chicken Afghani
items.description: Succulent chicken pieces marinated in a creamy blend of yogurt, cashew paste, and aromatic spices, grilled to perfection for a rich and indulgent culinary experience.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Paneer Wrap
items.description: Soft paneer cubes wrapped in a warm tortilla, bursting with flavorful spices and fresh veggies, a delightful fusion in every bite.

items.name: Chicken Tehari
items.description: One pot chicken rice cooked with caramalised onion, tomato, ginger-garlic paste and fresh garam masala

items.name: Begun Posto
items.description: A traditional Bengali dish that consists of deep-fried slices of eggplant (beguni) cooked in a creamy poppy seed (posto) paste.
items.extra: make it a meal with rice + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Kumro Chingri
items.description: A classic Bengali delicacy where tender pumpkin pieces and succulent prawns are simmered in a fragrant coconut-based curry, creating a harmonious blend of flavors.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Aloo Chop
items.description: A popular snack from the Eastern region of India, particularly in West Bengal. It is made by coating boiled and mashed potatoes with a mixture of spices and breadcrumbs, and then deep-frying until crispy and golden brown. Served with a side of green chutney. (4 chop)

items.name: Matar Pulao
items.description: Rice cooked with whole spice, ghee, green peas and garnished with mint and corinader

items.name: Kadgi Gashi
items.description: A traditional Konkani dish featuring tender jackfruit cooked in a coconut-based curry, infused with aromatic spices for a flavorful coastal delight.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Kori Ghassi
items.description: Manglorean chicken curry with curry leaves, spices and coconut milk
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 paratha or rice + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Undi
items.description: A savory steamed ball made from rice flour, grated coconut, and spices. (8 pieces)

items.name: Puttu & Kadala Curry
items.description: A comforting meal made of steamed rice flour layered with coconut and served with spicy warm black chickpea curry.

items.name: Maharastrian Veg Thali
items.description: A vegetarian feast from the state of Maharashtra. It consists of bharlele vangi (stuffed baby eggplants) & amti (maharashtrian style dal). To complete the feast, sol kadhi (a refreshing coconut milk based drink), koshimbir (spiced side salad), achar, papad, 2 chapati & rice.

items.name: Maharastrian Chicken Thali
items.description: A non vegetarian feast from the state of Maharashtra. It consists of spicy chicken curry & chicken sukka. To complete the feast, sol kadhi (a refreshing coconut milk based drink), koshimbir (spiced side salad), achar, papad, 2 chapati & rice.

items.name: Bharlele Vangi
items.description: A delicious Maharashtrian dish made with stuffed baby eggplants cooked in a spicy masala curry.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Maharashtrian Chicken Curry
items.description: A spicy Maharashtrian style chicken curry.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Malai Kofta
items.description: A curried vegetarian dish with crispy fired balls made of potato & paneer in a creamy, smooth, rich sauce
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Chicken Malai Kofta
items.description: Delicate chicken meatballs infused with creamy malai (cream) and aromatic spices, simmered in a rich tomato-based gravy
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Veg Crispy
items.description: Assorted vegetables such as bell peppers, onions, carrots, and cauliflower are dipped in a batter and deep-fryed until crispy, and then tossed in a tangy and spicy sauce. It's a popular Indo-Chinese appetizer,

items.name: Rajma Chawal
items.description: Red kidney beans cooked in a flavourful gravy with onion, tomato, ginger, garlic and spices topped with fresh garam masala and coriander. Served with steamy rice and papad.
